inputFields.name: activeTopics
inputFields.description: List of topics associated to group

inputFields.name: allowMemberPhotoUploads
inputFields.description: Indicates if members are allowed to upload photos

inputFields.name: coverPhotoId
inputFields.description:
Positive integer representing a numeric identifier for a photo, which must be one associated with this group. When undefined or 0, no photo is set.
This is refered to as Group.keyPhoto in Group responses

inputFields.name: feeCurrency
inputFields.description: Currency expressed in iso code 'USD', 'EUR', etc.

inputFields.name: joinMode
inputFields.description: The way a new member let into the group

inputFields.name: listAddress
inputFields.description: Indicates the username of the mailing list address

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Read-able name of the Group that members see

inputFields.name: needsPhoto
inputFields.description: Indicates if new member profile have to provide a photo

inputFields.name: needsQuestions
inputFields.description: Indicates if new member must answer questions to join

inputFields.name: questions
inputFields.description: List of 1 to 5 questions to be answered by new members when join the group

inputFields.name: socialNetworks
inputFields.description: List of social networks for the group
